flawed_nl_solution:
She has 180 minutes to do work because 3 times 60 equals <<3*60=180>>180
She has already spent 149 minutes on homework because 45 plus 30 plus 50 plus 25 equals <<45+30+50+25=149>>149
She has 31 minutes to finish her project because 180 minus 149 equals <<180-149=31>>31.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 149. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
